Package com.github.tadukoo.view.components.interfaces.paint

package com.github.tadukoo.view.components.interfaces.paint
Contains component paint-related interfaces
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.github.tadukoo.view.components.interfaces
    Contains interfaces for use in Components containing customizations that could be used in Tadukoo Look & Feel or another custom Look & Feel if desired, or used in other ways potentially.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    HasDisabledForegroundPaint
    Interface to be used on Components for them to contain a SizablePaint for disabled foreground.
    HasDisabledTextPaint
    Interface to be used on Components for them to contain a SizablePaint for disabled text.
    HasSelectAndFocusPaints
    Interface to be used on Components for them to contain SizablePaints for select and focus.
    HasSizablePaints
    Interface to be used on Components for them to contain SizablePaint versions of the foreground and background colors, to be used instead of the simple colors.
